fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Throw a dart at somebody, dealing a basic attack. Due to your slow attack speed, you can only use this ability every two nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Triple Dart**
-After one kill, you can now kill 3 people at once, but if you choose to do, you may not attack for three nights.
-After three kills, you may transform into the super monkey fan club, letting you attack one person every night.
-After five kills, you may transform into the plasma monkey fanclub, letting you attack three people every night.
**Spike Ball**
-After one kill, you gain a spike ball. may randomly attack three people.
-After five kills, your spike ball increases in size. may randomly attack five people.
-After 10 kills, your attack is upgraded to unstoppable.
-All of these may attack your teammates and you.
____
-Roleblock immune
-You can only choose to go one upgrade path per game. Upgrade paths are the things in bold.
